column5: This central Rockport cottage is blocks away from shopping and the beach! The house is perfect for families or friend getaways! There are 2 bedrooms with queen size beds, 2 full baths, a large kitchen, and plenty of comfy couches to sleep extra bodies! The backyard is filled with fruit trees, a bar area, and several patio seating areas to relax or dine on. I do rent out a separate small back house that may be rented as well (sleeps 2 additional guests): https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/14204396
